channel.title: Check my computer out (Warning: :( not much of a PC)
channel.description:
Her's some of my computer specifications:
[b]System: [/b]
Microsoft Windows 98 Second Edition 4.10.2222A ____________________________
[b]Computer:[/b]
GenuineIntel x86 Family 6 Model 8 Stepping 10 256 MB RAM(Just upgraded from 128 or so) <------- "upgraded" lol _____________________________
[b]Performance: [/b] Memory 256 MB RAM
System Resources: 44% Free (30GB and 15GB HDD)
File System: 32-bit
Virtual Memory: 32-bit ________________________
[b]Display and Sound:[/b]
NVIDIA GeForce2 MX/MX 400
No sound because I fucked it up. __________________________________
Some funny shit ^^
My computer is setup on my desk, next to my monitor. It has no case, the motherboad is mounted on a Metal platform, completely open to the air. I have it like that because it keeps the computer cooler and I can access stuff on the computer easier since I am constantly adding stuff, or fixing other stuff. I'll add some picture's when I get a hold of a camera.

item.title: Check my computer out (Warning: :( not much of a PC)
item.dc:creator: @Java_Is_My_Life Java Is My Life™
item.description:
@Java_Is_My_Life wrote:

[quote=“NewbieNewty, post:6, topic:252929”][quote author=maniown link=topic=334115.msg2603924#msg2603924 date=1230424326]
256 MB RAM

Omg you can almost hold a game. lol
[/quote]
Lol, you need 330MB for runescape. -xX330m in your Java variable.
lol I play wc3 with it all the time.

Actually, I was playing wc3 with 128MB.[/quote]

Read full topic

item.description:
@bootnecklad wrote:

[3/4/5]/10 it’s ok if you just do stuff on it but i would of thrown it out the window if i didn’t have my computer I would use it for classic games like quake, duke nukem, doom etc etc…

item.title: Check my computer out (Warning: :( not much of a PC)
item.dc:creator: @exps35 exps35
item.description:
@exps35 wrote:

[quote=“maniown, post:7, topic:252929”][quote author=NewbieNewty link=topic=334115.msg2603956#msg2603956 date=1230426438]

256 MB RAM

Omg you can almost hold a game. lol

lol I play wc3 with it all the time.

Actually, I was playing wc3 with 128MB.
[/quote]

Did it run alright?[/quote]

256mb isnt that bad, assuming you arent really all that into games.
there are quite a few simple games you can still get away with and have fun (assuming you don’t mind occasional but non-avoidable lag)

And what’s your CPU? Pentium 3 or 4 I assume?
Kinda reminds me of my OG computer from when I first got one in elementary school.

Read full topic
